title: Search for the shark callers
creator_credit: Grainger Maynard, Maynard and Greg Grainger
brief_description: A description of a two month trek by kayak through the Solomon Islands, showing the people and their culture, wildlife and tourist attractions. Experience the dying art of summon sharks with a native priest, visit steaming volcanoes and take part in pagan dances and other local ceremonies!
